website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy convertible car seat for children up to 50 pounds, incorporating side-impact protection and 5-point adjustable harness.
pros: Seat pad can be machine washed and dried
Many users find the price point reasonable
Can even be used for air travel
Lots of extra space for growing children
cons: Taller toddlers might not fit comfortably
Larger cups won't fit in holders
Some users would like thicker padding

customer_reviews.title: 29 lbs and she's a perfect fit. My son is almost 3 and 42 ...
customer_reviews.text: This will not hold a 50lb child. My daughter is 1.5 years old , 29 lbs and she's a perfect fit. My son is almost 3 and 42 lbs and he was not comfortable. We wanted to use these for travel. They're plastic buckets and the belts are limited, we couldn't clip my son in without it being snug, there was no give. We have a Britax Pinnacle G2, it's a god amongst car seats but too heavy for travel. Update! Returned both seats and purchased the Graco Atlas 2 in 1 Booster as backups/travel seats for both children and they are both happy!
customer_reviews.author: MarquessofPink

customer_reviews.title: Not comfy for airplane travel but will get the job done.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as it was recommended for airplane travel. We found that the seat buckle ended up right behind the padding which isn't very thick. We had to stick pillows behind him so he was comfortable. Has anyone else had this problem? We also have a hard time making the seat tight enough in the cars with the restraints on the seat. However, it is incredibly light and was much easier to lug around in Europe. It doesn't replace my Chicco car seat but it does the trick for the money.
customer_reviews.author: eana07

customer_reviews.title: 6 Week Old
customer_reviews.text: Bought this exclusively for a plane trip, as our regular car seat was not airline approved. Here is my 6 week old daughter taking it for a test run before we use it on the plane. Apart from ZERO head support, she was really happy in it. I’ve rolled up some receiving blankets to cushion her head, which isn’t really a big deal, but I think it’s good to know for those looking to purchase this for a littler one.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Crotch strap is ridiculously short, customer service has no option to help
customer_reviews.text: My son is a small kid, always has been. He's 33lb, 37inches tall at 4.5 years old. The crotch strap is so tight (and has been for the past year) that it's uncomfortable. I called Cosco to request a replacement strap (longer one), and I was told they don't offer a replacement for this model. Luckily (I guess?) this is only used for travel but now I have to buy a different seat that will not be squeezing my kid's crotch so much. Frustrating because he's well within the limits stated on this car seat. Super annoying.
customer_reviews.author: oc

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Lightweight - great for travel, also good if you need to keep using latch rather than the seatbelt such as in middle row seats that need to be adjusted forward and back for varying combinations of passengers. Cute look (in my opinion). Soft fabric. Good recline if you anticipate car sleep. Price. Cons: latch is basic and a little harder to get in and out. The straps are not long. We anticipate that our kiddo will outgrow this seat well before hitting weight and height recs because there is very little give to the strap left. The recline makes it hard for an older child to get in and out themselves.
customer_reviews.author: M. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: My little lady fit great in it with plenty of room to grow
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these car seats (pink, blue, and camo). Today we received the pink one in the mail and we just couldn't wait to try it out. My little lady fit great in it with plenty of room to grow. I drive a Ford Escape and I'll be honest when I say it was a very tight fit (rear facing). Once I'm ablet to flip her around forward facing I know I'll love it even more. All in all I'm very happy with it (and the color). I'll update later on after she's in it a bit and let y'all know how it is.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these as travel car seats for my 2 year old twins. Our regular car seats are 25 lbs and these are only 11 lbs, so much easier to travel with. I wasn't expecting much because they were so cheap, but bought them based on safety and other reviews. I have to say that I love them. They aren't as easy to install as my other seats that cost 5 times more, but my twins seem very comfortable and safe in them. The straps seem to glide when tightening, which makes it easy to get the appropriate tightness ( one of the most important purpose of a car seat). Plenty of leg room, and 2 cup holders.
customer_reviews.author: STO

customer_reviews.title: Our second one!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this after already owning one for our older daughter. We use it for travelling since it is lighter and easy to install. I have other car seats that are very heavy and bulky, as well as way more expensive, so I don't like to travel with them. With these ones, you just route the seat belt through the easy to find path and you're set to go. You can also use the latch option, which is easy enough too, but if you get into a car with hard to find anchors, the belt path is super fast to use. I only give it 4 stars because the harness can get stuck while trying to adjust it sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Devan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Tiny cup holders but lots of room for your little one
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this, he finds it very comfortable and there is plenty of room for him to grow. As parents we have 2 problems. 1- this was so hard to install in our car. We have a 2003 Pontiac Vibe, not a perfect fit. 2- the cup holders do not hold ANY of our cups or bottles. I haven't been able to find ones that do fit. I shouldn't have to buy cups for the carseat, I wish they had made the cup holders bigger. We did purchase a second for our other car because it's affordable, simple, and roomy. The cup holders aren't a deal breaker but frustrating none the less.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Gross

customer_reviews.title: Never buying another car seat online
customer_reviews.text: Took me a while to use but now my 12 month is going to need a new car seat again. Was a waste of money for my family. The camo is awesome but the cover doesn't fit and is always sliding off the top part of the carseat which i find terrifying especially with a lil one who is teething . Yes i could super glue is but then i wouldnt be able to clean the cover and it would still be a waste of our money. Going to buy another car seat and throw this out as soon as possible
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for ...
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend this. Purchased this for my mothers car who sometimes watches the baby. The car seat has basically no padding. Also to install it the instructions recommend stabilization with a rolled towel or a pool noodle. I do not feel safe having my baby in a seat that needs to be stabilized with that.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Q

customer_reviews.title: More expensive does not equal more safety
customer_reviews.text: My daughter purchased a vet high end car seat. I bought this one for my grandson and he seems to like this much better he can hold his bottle with ease and he seems to be able to rest better because the seat leans back a little bit more. I believe my grandson is very safe in this car seat. Check the safety guidelines before purchasing
customer_reviews.author: Scruples

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy!! No padding at all!!
customer_reviews.text: In the picture it looks like it's just nice & fluffy with plenty of soft padding. I thought so when I first got it out of the box too. My sister commented that it looked great. THEN I felt of it! There is NOTHING under the cover to pad it at all!! It's just sewn so that it looks padded, but when you push on it, it goes flat! My sister came back in and felt of it and said, "That's so hard where her head would rest, it would give her a concussion if you wrecked!" I agreed and returned it. I bought an Evenflo instead and it is padded nicely and is a great car seat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, basic car seat
customer_reviews.text: This car seat has all the basics you need. At this price, don't expect a lot of frills. The car seat adjusts easily, and installing is a breeze. It has just enough padding to not feel like you're sitting on a hard piece of plastic, but is not overly plush. The cup holders are quite small in diameter, and cannot hold toddler cups larger than 2 3/4" (about the size of a soda can). Considering the fact that many toddler cups can be 3" in diameter or larger, this seems like a gross oversight.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bjorgen

customer_reviews.title: The cover material is soft and the buckles are easy to use and do not irritate the skin
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old daughter fits perfectly and she loves it. The cover material is soft and the buckles are easy to use and do not irritate the skin. Even in the Las Vegas heat the seat stays cool and the buckles are designed with the only metal parts going into each other so nothing to burn the kid. Also, there's no moving parts in it like an adjustable back so there's no rattling or other noise like we've had with other seats.
customer_reviews.author: Alex P.

customer_reviews.title: Good for traveling and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after researching on lightweight car seats, based on our need for something we could travel easily fly with. It’s very light weight and easy to install. Managed to install it in a rental car in about 5 minutes. The gap to get the seatbelt through is relatively wide so made it quite straight forward to secure. It also has latch hooks which were also straight forward. We tried it in both a sedan and suv with no dramas. Overall it’s a good alternate seat at a low enough cost to justify the spend. My only advice is buy a travel bag at the same time if you’re not going to use it on the plane.
customer_reviews.author: Artdaug

customer_reviews.title: Super light and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: It's an extremely light seat and would be great for travel. Biggest downside is that the buckle button takes a lot of force to undo. Fits my 2 year old great. Well see how it works as she gets bigger since the bottom strap is a bit tight. For bigger kids it might be uncomfortable. For the price it's a really great seat, but all the fit and finish and details are nowhere near as good as the way more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: William Del Genio

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We really love this car seat. We have a Graco 4-ever and bought one of these as an extra for my parents to have. We loved it so much we bought one for my husband rather than another 4-ever. Sure it’s not a convertible, but for the price it’s great. We had so many issues with straps twisting on other car seats and that rarely happens here. It’s also roomy and comfy for our daughter to sit in. However, we have SUVs. If you had a sedan or smaller, I think this would be tough.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: So Light! Best Airplane carseat!!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT for the airplane. So easy to carry through the airport (I bought a backpack carrying back separately). This is so lightweight! Fits perfectly in the airplane seat (Jetblue, regular cabin). Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: ridgeback owner

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy plastic
customer_reviews.text: Would possibly be a good travel car seat since it is so light. We were looking for something we could use daily and also as our travel car seat and this just feels way more flimsy than I would like a car seat to feel. I would not feel comfortable putting my child in there daily. It was hard to install it tight enough as well. It kept sliding. We returned it without using it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin M.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to believe in this carseat, i really did! Its beautiful and has a good price tag. As a mom of a few kids you take a bargin when you can find one. This carseat was in my husbands truck as well as my tahoe and it would never stay secured down. The belt buckle always seemed very uncomfortable for my baby as well. I used this carseat for 2 months and I traded it for something else. We will continue to use this one for trips with grandparents but it does not serve well as an everyday carseat
customer_reviews.author: Tojo

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this light weight car seat to have in my car for when my grandson visits. The car seat he has in his parents' car is great too, but weighs much more and was 4 times the price. We all feel that this seat gives him the same protection as the other, and he seems just as comfy.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Great product, especially for its cost
customer_reviews.text: As grandparents, we wanted a lighter weight car seat that meets all safety requirements and is comfortable. This product meets that goal. Our only dislike is that it seems wider than others. That has made it somewhat tough to fit into the back seat because we also have 2 other car seats for our other grandchildren, but it works so we are happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: CBP

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and not great.
customer_reviews.text: PRO: light weight and has cup holders. CONS: feels cheap (but I’m also comparing it to a Britax), no shoulder pads, hard to adjust and lock in place, and barely any cushion on the chair. I wanted it for travel, but I’d rather use something twice as heavy as long as my LO is safe. This never get safe. IT DIDNT EVEN COME WITH ANY MANUAL OR PAPERS! It was literally thrown in the box and not even wrapped.
customer_reviews.author: tiah

customer_reviews.title: Simple and does it's job
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this carseat as an extra one for grandma's car and if I ever need to go on vacation (on flights). However the width of the carseat might be too wide. Its wider than my normal carsear graco 3-1 grow to fit. I do like the sleek look and its lightweight but I dont think I'll be taking this carseat on flights or vacation. Its too wide. I'll need to look for another carseat for traveling. But it does its job for grandmas car.
customer_reviews.author: Pafoua Yang

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my needs
customer_reviews.text: It's not the fanciest car seat out there but it's easy to install, lightweight, and has the latches on each side for the anchors in the back seat. I use for work when I have younger kids that need to be rear facing. It must be somewhat comfortable to because kids keep falling asleep in it. It's easy to install and if done properly it won't wiggle or move around. Put body weight into the seat to get a better install on the strap. It's also super easy to get them in and out of but I do wish it had the shoulder padding on the straps like my other car seats have.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: So we got this car seat for our trip to Disney because it was so lightweight. The only good thing about it is that it is lightweight. Everything else was bad. I could never get the seat tight enough and it would shift when car turned, good that I was sitting in the back. Also when my son would fall asleep his head would move so much when car turned I would probably invest in some head cushion for car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Ngo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling with kids 5-50lbs
customer_reviews.text: great buy for traveling, its 11lbs and can fit a child 5-50 lbs i think it says. we took it to aruba and installed in seconds in 2 cabs rides. we had our 2 year old rear facing in it for the trip and then gave it to someone who wanted to use it as a secondary car seat. was so easy to take it on vacation, it even fit on top of our compact stroller and we push it around the airport.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Avoid these seats!!
customer_reviews.text: Belts are WAY TOO SHORT!! Both our children are under 40lbs and the belts on these seats have to be fully extended to allow the kids to fit. Even then, it is uncomfortably tight. There is no further adjustment or room for growth at all. Fortunately we just bought two of these for vacation spares, but they would be worthless for anything else. Their advertisement of fitting a 50lb child is a JOKE!!
customer_reviews.author: Don L

customer_reviews.title: Favorite car seat!
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat! When my son was about 6 months old he started getting really heavy carrying him around in the other car seat, I purchased this and thought if he was big enough he could use it. It arrived on time, very pretty camo, good material, and after I received it I realized that the car seat accommodates infants from 5 pounds up to toddlers weighing 40 pounds in rear facing mode and kids up to 50 pounds in forward facing mode, he is now 3 and we’re still using it! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pink Sunflower

customer_reviews.title: You really get less than what you pay for ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this car seat for grandparents car, don't feel safe with my child riding in it. Cover is flimsy and doesn't stay on the base very well causing a shifting hazard. The bottom of the seat is very rough and I am afraid it's going to tear the car seat. Does not sit flat, have to install at angle. Older models of this brand used to be decent for a spare seat, but this one is awful. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Ez to use and price is right.
customer_reviews.text: How would I know comfort? My kids tell me this is the grandparents model. Price is right and my kids are satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Big Boat Guy

customer_reviews.title: Lays down very flat when rear-facing
customer_reviews.text: I have tall children and I’m just not sure how long this is going to fit my child. He is only just 2 and the straps are pulled out to the max just to accommodate his height. Also when put in the vehicle rear-facing as required by law until 2 in my state it lays down at an angle that looks comfortable but my child is not used to. It lays down quite far.
customer_reviews.author: deligirl2

customer_reviews.title: Nice travel car seat.
customer_reviews.text: When this first arrived I really questioned it cause it is different from our Graco car seat, but we needed it for travel. My baby was really comfortable in it, he slept in it for 8 hours on a plane (was a 9 hour flight), then we did a lot of driving to get to our destination and he did really well in this car seat. Its easy to carry around the airport and once you install it a couple of times it’s quick to do. Now we use it as our secondary car seat in my husbands truck.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Belt clip is super hard to open
customer_reviews.text: No very comfortable, the belt clip is absurdly hard to open! I’m not sure if it is supposed To be that way or mine came defective, but my wife can’t open the clip only me... that’s very annoying I bought the car seat for her due to I already have one on my car but she can’t open the clip so we had to switch to my car... I wish that I had time to return it before... now it’s too late
customer_reviews.author: João Lima

customer_reviews.title: Super light, good for travel
customer_reviews.text: We traveled to Europe with our 1 &1/2 year old daughter. We have some pretty nice carseats for our daily drivers, but they are heavy by most standards. We couldnt envision traveling with those and so we found this one. It worked absolutely great. Super, super light and was plenty comfortable for our daughter. Quality seems very good, and it seems like it was pretty comparable in comfort and design to our main ones at home.
customer_reviews.author: Barrett1134

customer_reviews.title: super light; great for traveling, taxi/uber rides
customer_reviews.text: - great for a chubby baby, lots of room on the side - very portable and easy to install (just tied down by the click of a regular seat belt); great for uber rides - very light!!!! can easily hold up the seat with one hand - great for travel esp if you are flying - because the seat is quite a bit wider than some, you might have a issues fitting 3 in a row if that's something you want to consider
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great extra/backup car seat
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these as extra car seats for the vehicles my child doesn't ride in as often. Seems sturdy and safe. Nice to have built in cup holders that can't be removed and thrown around the car. It's not a fancy, luxury seat, so it might not be as comfortable for long trips or daily use. The buckles are a little difficult to unfasten, but that's probably good so kids can't easily get out. I need a little more practice though :). Price is very affordable and it's lightweight for travel.
customer_reviews.author: QualityComfortStyle

customer_reviews.title: SO easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I drive a Chevy Tracker and this seat fits perfect. Other family members have used this seat in their car and we have had no problem installing it tight enough with just the rear facing seat belt installation. The latch system is included but since we move this seat so often, we don't use it. I feel like it is safe enough for the baby without having to use the latches. I DO recommend this seat!. It is really roomy for my 9 month old and there isn't much cushion, but the baby fits comfortably and the straps keep her safe :)
customer_reviews.author: Shelli W.

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this car seat for our little one, the install was pretty simple but I have to have his rear facing and I am not sure if it’s my leather seats or the base of the car seat but it doesn’t sit flat- I had to recline my passenger seat to actually help secure the car seat from slipping forward. I know if it was turned forward the seat will be perfect. My son seems to enjoy it and it is comfy for him.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena henry

customer_reviews.title: Great seat when new
customer_reviews.text: Received product and it appeared used. The seat was all scuffed, the pad wouldnt stay over the shell, and there were red wood shavings covering the seat. Normally I'm not too picky about a little wear and tear but when I purchased it new, and needing a car seat to be new (because you never know the history of the seat like if its been in an accident), i returned it. Amazon sent me a new one the next day and it was in perfect condition. It is easy to install. Easy to adjust. Light weight. Made traveling across the country super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Reesy_Rose

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for cheap - beware of latch system compatibility in your car - pain to install
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't use this for my regular car seat as it's not very padded, but it does the job for Grandma's house. We did however, take it to the Fire Station near by to have them install it properly. In Grandma's Toyota Yaris, even though it has the latch system, this combo of the seat and car were not latch compatible. It took 2 firemen to install it safely - one pushing down on the seat and the other tightening the belt.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Small and light, but not easy to load child!
customer_reviews.text: Not a very good design on this car seat! Looks nice and it’s small and light, but very difficult to get your little one strapped in! There’s no way to keep the straps or buckle out of the way, so you have to dig for them, which is not fun for you or the child! I would consider another design or a model with armrests so you have a way to keep the straps clear!
customer_reviews.author: Craig L. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I tried for a carseat with a good safety rating that was affordable
customer_reviews.text: The strap between the legs does not adjust- it does have 3 slots to POSITION it but not to lengthen. It is too short for my 3 year old- she is cramped in. I tried for a carseat with a good safety rating that was affordable. I do not believe the quality is there to protect my daughter in the event of a side impact.
customer_reviews.author: Ferne F.

customer_reviews.title: Could not get saftey in
customer_reviews.text: Giving it a 1 star review only because we took this car seat to our local fire station and it took 4 firemen to try and get this safely into our jeep Cherokee. After multiple attempts and pool noddles, they did not feel comfortable with us leaving with the car seat. We were hoping to use this as a “cheaper”back up for grandparents car but we will be returning and getting a different one. This may work for another style of car but not ours. I wanted to like it, but saftey is more important!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Seibel

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t installed yet, but these are very clean and nice. I ordered the ones with damaged packaging so it would be a little cheaper..I have three in car seats! I highly recommend ordering those up first if you’re interested in this car seat. They are obviously still brand new. The only thing I wasn’t expecting was the base doesn’t transition, I’ve only had convertible ones that do, but nonetheless they will do the job
customer_reviews.author: Cydney

customer_reviews.title: Rear facing - look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to install rear facing correctly. Using latch system, this seat would not install tightly and had way too much “wiggle” room. Thankfully, my son is big enough to safely face forward, but it’s not my preference. The seat is super lightweight and we will use for travel only. Hindsight, I’d pay more for a seat that installs properly and safely.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend for someone on a budget
customer_reviews.text: These carseats are absolutely adorable and my twins seem to really like them, only issue I seemed to have was using the latch hooks it didn't seem to tighten quit as good as I would have thought so I actually looped the seat belt strap through the carseats as well and it's nice and snug now.
customer_reviews.author: Danee Jean

customer_reviews.title: Another carseat that wont stay upright
customer_reviews.text: Cute and pad is easy to wash but will not stay in an upright position rear facing. It is made so that when rear facing, there is noting to support the angle at which it is supposed to sit.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Newman

customer_reviews.title: So hard
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a insert, I purchased this as a backup car seat and immediately noticed how hard it is. THERES NO PADDING to support little backs and butts! That's not going to be comfortable for any distance. Spend the extra cash on a seat with inserts.
customer_reviews.author: Small shopping addict

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this car seat
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe we bought a $300 car seat and didn't buy this first. We originally bought it just for travel since it's SO light and if it gets damaged it's not the end of the world. Our two year old actually likes this way more so we end up using this one most of the time. It doesn't have all the little nooks and crannies like our expensive one so I'm not constantly digging crumbs out with this one. Just as easy to install as the rest. DEFINITELY buy,
customer_reviews.author: CLC

customer_reviews.title: Easy for non-parents to use
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my 2-year-old nephew's visit without having to spending a ton. The seat was easy to install, and we are not parents and don't know much about keeping small humans alive. Nephew fell asleep in it on the first day, so I'm guessing he was comfortable enough. The cover comes off so we were able to wash it and the chair base for the next visit.
customer_reviews.author: scc917

customer_reviews.title: Decent car seat
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent car seat for the price. It has 2 cup holders. Our major complaint is the bottom buckle. It is too far back in the bottom of the seat. Each time we put our toddler in the seat, we have to reach under his rear end to pull the buckle out. :(
customer_reviews.author: Coral Ann

customer_reviews.title: Light as a feather!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for traveling by plane. It is about 1/3 of the weight of our regular car seat, which is great for someone like me who frequently flies with two kids by myself. It probably isn't ideal for long road trips, speaking to the comfort of the padding, but worth the investment for ease of travel!
customer_reviews.author: Gracie Kay

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit on airplanes (even large international ones)
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is light weight. That's really all it has going for it. We bought it for flying, but in order for the car seat to be snug on the plane, the buckle has to be directly under the baby's lower back. It is very uncomfortable (crying in pain) and unworkable. There needs to be a routing path for the seatbelt that doesn't put the buckle there.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Staying with Cosco brand
customer_reviews.text: Used the Cosco infant car seat and decided to go with same brand when my granddaughter outgrew it. Using as a rear facing seat with plenty of leg room. Like the flexibility to turn face forward as child grows and gets older. Great value so far ...
customer_reviews.author: MinkinsMusic

customer_reviews.title: Easy for Grandma to use
customer_reviews.text: I have one car seat from Cosco and needed a second. This is a relatively light car seat and fairly easy to install. I’m a grandmother that just needs to transport 2 grandchildren occasionally and these are not as complicated to use as some of the more expensive seats.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS CARSEAT !!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat! It works great & is compatible with the GOGOBABYZ attachment! Very durable, we purchased this just for airplane travel & now I wish I bought it for our personal vehicles but overall we love it, & baby is very comfortable in it!
customer_reviews.author: Chrys

customer_reviews.title: Air travel must have.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for air travel we got two for a trip to the Bahamas. So glad we had carseats, my two boys fell right to sleep on the plane I noticed other moms struggling to hold their wiggly babies on the long flight. The seatbelt buckle does hit in the middle of back but I just padded it with their blankies. Now that the trip is over I use them in Grandma's car so I don't have to transfer seats.
customer_reviews.author: michelle quick

customer_reviews.title: A great backup/travel car seat!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a value priced 2nd car seat for my Husband's car. I did lots of research and read a ton of reviews. It fits a bit snug in my Husband's 2 door but for quick rides to drop off or pick her up from grandma's house, it works. I wasn't sold on the print but once our little one is sitting in you can hardly notice the pattern. I like the quality and price so much that we purchased a 3rd one for grandma's car.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend for a small child for everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: While the seat is very roomy and will allow the child to grow without needing to purchase a larger seat for a while, the seat is very light weight and not much padding for comfort. I only use this seat a couple of times a week for short distances, but I would not recommend for smaller babies and daily or long distance use. It was a little challenging to get it secured in my car so that it would not move around as well.
customer_reviews.author: CPM

customer_reviews.title: Light weight car seat
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a second car seat for when a relative may be taking our daughter, and it is perfect for that because it is so light. I definitely like the Graco better, but for the price I am impressed with the light weight design.
customer_reviews.author: Ay-Dub

customer_reviews.title: Only use for traveling
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is good if you’re traveling or in a pinch or for someone who occasionally takes care of your kiddo but definitely not for long term. It’s hard to tighten and loosen the straps & sometimes hard to install tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Winter Coyne

customer_reviews.title: Simple, quality seat for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat, not too bulky & super lightweight! Easy to install. Cover easily comes off to wash. Easier to tighten the anchor straps with the cover off. We got one for each car since it's such a great price. Little man is comfy, will fall asleep in it no problem. Love that the cup holders are apart of the seat frame and not just clip on. He's got plenty of room to grow! We will be getting this seat for any future babies also.
customer_reviews.author: samanthaxrandom

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight and great for traveling! Idiot proof to install if a non-parent has to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie K.

customer_reviews.title: very nice and light weight!!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this car seat is light weight and roomy,it's as wide as my forearm as shown in my second picture and I wear a size 10 shoe so that's wide (ur forearm is the same size of your foot for those that have no idea why I compared the two,lol)its a pretty violet blet.definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ebonie wooten

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s an awesome seat! Only issue I’ve had with install, is it is NOT three across friendly!! It’s a lot wider than I had anticipated.. My only complaint is the short crotch buckle.. My little is only 18mo, and is already sitting on the strap in the middle slot.. It makes it difficult to buckle him.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Richards

customer_reviews.title: Airplane Seat
customer_reviews.text: Used for airplane only. Great cheap seat for a toddler on an airplane. I don't use it in our car, however as it's not super sturdy and there's no head/ neck padding at all. I wouldn't feel like my child was very safe in a car crash, however for an airplane it's very comfortable, fit in the seat great and it's super lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: M_Ammons

customer_reviews.title: Only 10 lbs! And can use on airplane!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing that it is only 10 pounds and you can wear it as a backpack to more easily shlep it around! Used it to fly recently and the air hostess was shocked when she picked it up and it was not heavy like all the other ones she has seen!
customer_reviews.author: Keren S.

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok. Thought about returning but kept it in the end
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is bigger than I imagined specially since it’s sold as a travel car seat. it is lightweight and large enough to make sure my boy is comfortable. I do feel that it could have a bit more padding. There is only one layer of padding between the plastic seat and the baby. I wonder how that would feel in an impact and how safe it would be
customer_reviews.author: vivianalozano

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, spacious, perfect for plane flight!
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat. It’s especially perfect for plane flights! Which is really why I bought it. It’s light weight, easy to carry. Easy to install! Very wide and spacious so my son had plenty of room! Fit perfectly on the plane seat. Is aircraft approved on sticker in case airline checks! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Hepburn & Chelsea Hepburn

customer_reviews.title: BIG, but I love it!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 9 months old. Fits really well in this car seat. The straps are a little hard to adjust to make sure they are tight enough. Installation was a little tricky because the car seat is SO big. I have to move my passenger seat all the way up for it to be leveled correctly. But it is very snug in my car, in regards to the anchors. I feel as though he is very safe in this car seat. I would recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: No bottom latch
customer_reviews.text: The product itself seems really nice, but after we opened the box, we realized there were no bottom latches or attachments that could be a latch. Just the car seat and the top latch. Maybe ours just didn’t have it or maybe it’s just false advertising. Not sure which one, but we’re still bummed since we like to use the latch system instead of the seatbelts.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Moss

customer_reviews.title: Washes well, looks great.
customer_reviews.text: A few months in and I LOVE this. I still can't believe what I got for the price. It looks and feels like an expensive carseat. My 1.5 year old, 20ish lb daughter seems to like it and I like the cheerful pink color! She's spilled things in there and it's VERY easy to clean. The cover comes off like any other carseat and it washes without any problem (on delicate, hang to dry). I will be buying another for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Vine-Akuh

customer_reviews.title: too large for rear facing in smaller vehicles
customer_reviews.text: This is quite large. I bought this for my husbands 2007 F150 extended cab and it fits rear facing with the passenger seat pulled all the way forward. We’re going to have to forward face with this seat and it should help with space. A lot larger than our Graco Extend2Fit that fits well in my Ford Fusion. If you are buying to rear face it would probably work for a ginormous SUV but not a compact car or truck.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Sorry but I’m very very disappointed with this product not worth the money , my sons is never comfortable in this seat and the material it’s made of is very cheap , I can guarantee you that it won’t take long before your start regretting this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mehdi

customer_reviews.title: We ❤️ it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth the $ and it's so easy to install. It took me just few moments to get it in the car with all extra harnesses. Blue is great and easy to clean. Recommend for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Russki

customer_reviews.title: The material is true to picture as well as easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I definitely got my money worth for this product. I ordered this seat as a secondary car seat for my daughter who is now two. She rode rear facing and had no problem with leg room. The material is true to picture as well as easy to clean. This product worked great for us to be able to move from car to car with ease. Very easy to install and light weight. I like that it had a lot of slots for the straps to adjust. Not to bulky when in the car with other seats.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Light, brightly colored, comfy
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight!! Easy to move between vehicles. We’re still rear facing and it fits well in my car. It’s pretty wide, it definitely would not sit 3 across, but I could fit my 8yo between two if I needed to. I vacuum it out with my car once a week and it is in perfect condition 3 months later!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Very wide
customer_reviews.text: It's a lot wider than it looks in the photo. So if you have a small vehicle don't get this one. I needed a slim carseat, but this will do. Other than being too big it is great. Bright pretty blue, soft cover. It was easy to buckle into my car.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great value, good fit in mid-sized car (BMW)
customer_reviews.text: It was a little bigger than I expected, but my 2 yo loves it. The drink holders are closer to the child than some models...this is a good thing! Easier for them to reach. Fits well in the back seat of my 3 series BMW. Great seat for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: great for travel
customer_reviews.text: its big but not a hassle .... not a lot of moving parts and roomier... great for traveling..... Ready to go onto an advanture when traveling???, this is your child seat....
customer_reviews.author: Camilo Virguez

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I use this as my second car seat for my son. I love that it’s so lightweight and easy to install in and out of different cars. It’s really a click and go. My son sits comfortably in it. Good fit in the car, not bulky. Easily fits another person next to it. My kid can reach the cup holder. Will prob buy another one for my other son.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte

customer_reviews.title: Safe and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is like a dream come true. It’s very sturdy and safe, but it’s incredibly lightweight at the same time. This car seat is perfect for traveling with my son because it doesn’t weigh more than him. Traveling through airports with his previous car seat was like a nightmare because it was so bulky and heavy, but this seat weighs around 10 pounds or so and it makes life a lot easier for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Lee

customer_reviews.title: It's ok....
customer_reviews.text: Pros: beautiful blue Lightweight Cons: it slants back so its not child cannot sit straight up Its very wide (huge almost imo) Seems almost too small for my average sized 17 month old.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Too wide and bulky!
customer_reviews.text: Nice seat for the price. Easy to install and simple, but it's way to wide! This is my 25lb 18 month old and as you can see it swallows him! We already own an expensive Graco model with all the extras and I was looking for a smaller less bulky model for my husbands car, but this isn't it!
customer_reviews.author: FamDoc

customer_reviews.title: Matches Subaru STi seats 🙂
customer_reviews.text: I had the same brand car seat as a hand me down. My son seem to like it so I decided to get him this and he loves it the cup holders are very handy. This is great for a second car seat as he mostly rides in the wife car she decided to get him a Maxi-Cosi car seat. A plus for me is that it's blue and seems to match well in my Subaru STi because my whole interior is blue.
customer_reviews.author: HGZ **

customer_reviews.title: Room to Grow
customer_reviews.text: We now own fours of these bad boys and I have to say that we all really love them! There is plenty of room to grow into them and I know they will be with us for a long time. I'm really glad that I got these. They're lightweight, easy to install, a little big, but that's to be expected. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Devin W

customer_reviews.title: Nice for a second/travel car seat.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a 2nd car seat for our kid when we have carpools or playdates. I would not love this as a primary car seat, it feels a bit flimsy and making any size adjustments is annoying, but it works. My kid prefers it to her own car seat because "it has cupholders". Also, it is very lightweight which would be nice for travel.
customer_reviews.author: B. F.

customer_reviews.title: Better than the expensive ones!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a back up for my husbands car. The first two car seats I got were graco that cost about $250. This was more simple and my kids prefer this car seat, so we bought 2 more for my parent’s car since they were so inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: N. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Low priced safe car seat
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this seat for a trip. We usually use a high priced competitor. But this car seat fit the bill. It’s light weight, inexpensive, and has a good safety rating. It’s a no frills seat. No head wings, no extra body pillows, but it does the job at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, perfect to take when traveling
customer_reviews.text: Kids were 1y9m and a 10m old. We traveled by plane and checked in these two car seats to use on our car rentals. Didn’t need them for the flight because we bought lap seats. We bought travel bags to check them in. Very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Easy to Install, & other features
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat! We bought this after our little girl outgrew her bucket car seat at around 14 months. Our daughter is 3 years old & it still works for her. This car seat is basic but with all the important features, 5-point harness, safety, comfort, lightweight, and easy to move & reinstall to another car. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: If he fits he sits
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and my son is comfortable but it is VERY large. Also it has a weird slant to the base so my some sits at a backward incline but that doesn’t bother him. Pretty good for the price, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for a decent car seat. I stopped buying expensive ones after my oldest son. They grow so fast you spend too much on them for suck short periods of time. Worth the price for nothing too fancy.
customer_reviews.author: Grant & Charity

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat for grandmas car
customer_reviews.text: This is a great car seat ! I only have my grandson a couple times a month but it helps to have one in my car. He seems to like it! It really worked well with the latch system. It seems very secure. I watched a YouTube video on the install and that helped a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy P.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this car seat! Has been perfect for my husband's truck and grandparent's car. We didn't want to spend another $100+ on a second car seat for my husband's truck, so we found this. It has been perfect and honestly, I would have been fine with having as our primary car seat as well. Would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: This car seat was great for traveling!! It is so lightweight, I was able to take the seat out with my sleeping child(To transfer from our car to shuttle car to airport)!!! my son seemed comfortable and he loved having cup holders for his water cup. I checked it with our luggage and it made it just fine to our destination.

customer_reviews.title: Only For Skinny Kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 39 pounds. The center strap that comes up between her legs only goes so far - not far enough. There is NO WAY this seat goes to 50 pounds. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sara C.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I have a red one of these and the blue one of these overall they seem to be doing good they are kind of difficult to clean because you got to take everything out in order to take the fabric off to wash it and if you are an expert at installing it it's fairly easy
customer_reviews.author: Heather larson

product_meta.title: Cosco Apt 50 Convertible Car Seat, Vibrant Blue
product_meta.description: Color:Vibrant BlueKids ride longer with the Cosco Apt 50 Convertible Car Seat - all the way to 50 pounds. The Apt keeps them safer during every stage, with Side Impact Protection and 4 harness heights for the best fit as they grow. They'll love the comfortable ride and you'll love the machine washable pad that makes messes easy to clean. No more worries about dropped juice or those crazy cracker crumbs. Just take off the pad and toss it into the machine for a real neat seat you can't get with spot cleaning. Two integrated cup holders make sure your copilot has plenty of room for drinks or a snack during the ride.
feature_bullets: Rear facing 5 to 40 pounds and 19 to 40 inches height
Forward facing 22 to 50 pounds and 29 to 43 inches height
Machine washable seat pad for quick and easy cleanup

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,149 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
